author: Oj Rosero
comment: The game is a joke. Played it for awhile and you can't beat the a.i. even with all star batters and pitchers. Waste of time!

reply.author: Aerilys
reply.content: Hi Oj! Sorry you're feeling that way. I assure you it's possible to win! Feel free to send an email or a tweet of you want some advices ;)

author: james Lawson
comment: Love this app. Been to 4 baseball cups and I won one of them.  I did it with an expansion team too.

author: Reese Dumas
comment: I'm.not a baseball fan but I like this game

author: Hema Duseja
comment: Hula LA LA

author: Rio Sebastian
comment: Worrrrrrrsttttttttttt!!!!!!!.......

author: Slappy McAssSmack
comment: Love it!

author: Mr. Waffle
comment: Amazing I love it but there is a problem where it always puts my team in the west even when I chose east but other then that I love it

author: Elijah Jensen
comment: I think to do something like this like fantasy football but with baseball and to make your own team its amazing🇺🇸⚾😂👍

author: megan turner
comment: Can't put it down. If you know baseball you'll love this. But, never get matched up for a multiplayer game and have no idea what "purple tickets" are about.

reply.author: Aerilys
reply.content: Thank you very much Mic! Have you taken a look at the beta version of Baseball Legends 2? You might enjoy it ;)

author: Glenn Karikari
comment: To play this games, you need to understand the sport. If you do not then the game will suck for you!! The game is great, makes you think strategically. Especially when you have to rotate your batters and pitchers. What I would have love, is a more in depth simulation. Ex: able to put in a pinch hitter, to have their position labelled next to their names, to know if my pitchers strucked out the batter, add information on how long is the season, add the ability to make trades or adjust it and many more.

reply.author: Aerilys
reply.content: Thank you for this review Glenn :D

title: Honest Review

author: Christopher Johnson
comment: A little on the cheezy side but the game play is good if you like franchise baseball with fake players... It's fun
title: It's pretty good

author: Steve jobs
comment: Love it can't put it down. One bug tho I will switch out 1 player in the line-up and it moves 2-3 other players positions to some random spots. Other than that 5 star all the way

author: Aaron
comment: Good game, but could use a little more with players. New players should be available and a easier trading system
title: No problems yet

author: Blink
comment: Everything is good but I hate it when I go on a losing streak and can't do anything about  it
title: Love it

author: Brennen Diamond
comment: Would be better with drafts, but then I saw that there was a beta version of the second game and was like "Yes." Great game!

reply.author: Aerilys
reply.content: Thanks Brennen! There is no draft in the new version yet, but it's coming very soon! Stay tuned :D

author: XiaoXiao Chen
comment: Dull. Uninstalled

comment: Can anyone help me on how to hire coaches?

reply.author: Aerilys
reply.content: Hi Andrew! I'd be glad to help you if you send me an email :D

comment: Can't figure out how to play

comment: Make a hockey game like this

comment: So fun

comment: It's good but complicated
title: Good, but.......

comment: It's ok should make football version

author: Mista Chris
comment: Tried emall
title: Best yet

author: Steven Bishop
comment: I haven't gotten into all the details this game has to offer, but there's a lot to like about the simple management play. Good excitement as I'm trying to utilize all of my hitters and pitchers. So far I'm 10 -7. Great work on this!

reply.author: Aerilys
reply.content: Thanks Steven for your great review!

title: Fun Game

author: Kevin Cornist
comment: I have both baseball and basketball ones now just need football version would be great
title: Is there a football star ?

author: Steven Cleveland
comment: Overall the game is really fun and entertaining. No performance issues either.
title: Overall pretty good. Can't wait for some new updates.

author: Michael Marte
comment: I love it love it loveit. Its just perfect
title: Great

author: Rodney Whalen
comment: Where are the updates??
title: Rodney

author: Anthony Kahn
comment: Definitely wish there was an easier way to see your batters position outside of their menu. Lots to improve but yeah I'm hooked. Best sports management game I've seen on Android

reply.author: Aerilys
reply.content: Thank you very much Anthony! Feel free to send any additional feedback by email :)

title: Good stuff

author: Jamie
comment: It is the best baseball game i know. No just kidding. It is a very good and nice game. Only, i can t log in with my account

author: Banana Cramps
comment: Easily the best manager game out there. Keep up the good work!
title: Great game

author: Tyler Burkham
comment: Fantastic Game! Would be awesome to see live play by play though!!

reply.author: Aerilys
reply.content: Thank you for your review Tyler!

title: Snailed It

comment: Hope to receive positive comments for well performed batters even if they  didnt play well in one single game

reply.author: Aerilys
reply.content: Thank you! Feel free to send me any suggestion you may have :)

author: Joshua Barrett
comment: It's a good game enjoyed it back can't start another season game keeps crashing

reply.author: Aerilys
reply.content: Hi Zachary! The new update is available and should fix your issue. Sorry again for the inconvenience.

title: Good game

author: Jamie Stoyles
comment: Possibly the most addictive game ever

reply.author: Aerilys
reply.content: Thank you very much Jamie! Feel free to send me an email if you want to give more feedback or have ideas to improve the game.

title: Quality

author: Jerome Waldher
comment: Love this game.

reply.author: Aerilys
reply.content: Thank you Jerome! Feel free to send me an email if you have suggestions to improve the game!

author: Darius Moore
comment: Why does this game take so long to get through one season man i swear I've had this game since it came out and I'm still not even finished with the first season, and my record doesn't even match any of the other teams records this doesn't make sense at all ok.

reply.author: Aerilys
reply.content: Hi Darius. Maybe you should try to start a new season. A lot of bugs have been fixed, and it's not that long to get through a season :)

author: haran eiger
comment: Awesome game love playing it can't get enough

author: James Wiltfong
comment: So I sadly didn't get your reply until recently and I'd have to say wow. Truely professional and glad you listened. I would love to talk more with anything on this game.

reply.author: Aerilys
reply.content: Thanks for this updated and great review James! Feel free to join the community or send me an email to discuss :)

title: Amazing response

comment: Its alright. Not much thought or energy put into it but its a good time waster
